mapper.insert: insert into solution(uid, problem_id, contest_id, title, language, state, submit_time) select #{uid}, #{problemId}, #{contestId}, title, #{language}, 'IN_QUEUE', #{submitTime} from problem where problem_id = #{problemId}
mapper.update: update solution set state = #{state}, result = #{result}, total = #{total}, passed = #{passed}, pass_rate = #{passRate}, score = #{score}, time = #{time}, memory = #{memory}, error_info = #{errorInfo} where solution_id = #{solutionId}
